text: Labordia lydgatei, the Wahiawa Mountain labordia, is a species of flowering plant in the Loganiaceae family. It is endemic to the Hawaiian Islands, where it is present only in the Wahiawa Mountains of Kauai. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== lydgatei Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Biota of Kauai Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Labordia lydgatei
